Subject: Reminder and call for contributions

EVERYONE is welcome to submit information, commentary, movie / anime 
reviews/ art fiction/ what-have-you for Shinsengumi related things you 
may have seen. It doesn't matter if it's already represented on the site 
I think it would be great to get as many opinions as we can since we all 
view thing differently.

I added a few comments to the run down of Shinsengumi Keppuroku that 
Secretarytocapt3 wrote and  Okita contributed his thoughts to what he's 
seen of the new NHK drama.  Have anything to add to my ramblings on PMK 
or RK or the kenshin OVAs? C'mon and toss 'em my way.

-- 
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
